message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It holds significant value for you, worth $1,200,000. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to pay closer to $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us considering the product's value.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your valuation of the product. I am willing to consider your offer. In light of our discussion, I propose a price of $1,050,000 for the product. This allows for a compromise between our positions while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
